title: Lower Your Gaze Challenge
description: Avoid looking at anyone or anything immodest today. Practise intentional lowering of the gaze.

title: Lust-Free Vision – 7 Days
description: Be mindful of desire in your gaze. Lower your eyes instantly upon temptation, for a full week.

title: 14 Days of Gaze Purity
description: Avoid all lustful looking — in real life or online. Reflect daily on self-control and dignity.

title: Catch Yourself Staring
description: If you catch yourself staring, gently blink and look away. Practise this 5 times today.

title: Respectful Eyes – 7 Days
description: For one week, train yourself to keep your gaze respectful, calm, and brief.

title: 14-Day Gaze Discipline
description: Avoid lingering looks. Respond to every temptation by remembering Allah.

title: One Day Screen Filter
description: No inappropriate images today — no scrolling, no media, no excuses.

title: 7-Day Visual Detox
description: Avoid social media, movies, or ads that display indecency or glamorise sin.

title: 14-Day Purity Media Fast
description: For 2 weeks, actively avoid all exposure to haram visual content.

title: Look With Mercy
description: Today, when you look at someone, ask: 'How does Allah see them?' Not 'How do I?'

title: 7 Days of Inner Vision
description: Avoid judging anyone based on clothes, face, or body. See the soul, not the shell.

title: 2 Weeks of Dignified Gaze
description: Practice humility: speak kindly to anyone you might normally overlook.

title: Scroll Without Jealousy
description: Today, browse mindfully — no comparison, no envy. Celebrate others’ blessings.

title: 7 Days Without Comparison
description: For one week, if you feel envy rise, say a du‘a of blessing for the other person.

title: 14-Day Comparison Cleanse
description: Avoid all comparing your life to others’ images. Focus on gratitude and self-worth.

title: Polite Eyes Challenge
description: Make people feel respected by avoiding intense staring. Practise 5 mindful interactions.

title: Stare-Free Week
description: Rein in your gaze for 7 days — especially in shops, queues, and online.

title: Respect the Space of Others
description: Go 14 days without letting your eyes linger where they are not welcome.

title: One Focused Prayer
description: Today, try to complete one full prayer without looking around once.

title: Prayer Eye Control – 7 Days
description: Train yourself to keep your eyes in sujood. Lower your gaze in every prayer for 7 days.

title: 14-Day Salah Gaze Discipline
description: For 2 weeks, guard your gaze during salah. Let your eyes lead your heart to humility.
